modalSubtitle: Your account credentials are used to verify your identity and protect your data. The system employs enterprise-grade PBKDF2-SHA256 encryption, ensuring all sensitive operations are traceable and auditable.
featureDesc: MGMT ERP is an enterprise-grade management system built for cross-border e-commerce sellers. Integrating purchasing, inventory, finance, and sales analytics modules to help you manage supply chains efficiently, optimize operations, and boost profitability.
heroDesc: Integrating purchasing, inventory, finance, and sales analytics modules to help you manage supply chains efficiently, optimize operations, and boost profitability.
module_sales_desc: Order Tracking · P&L Reports · ETL Sync
